title: In case of larger layout where there is existing/proposed Club House in layout RG under Regulation 27 ofthese regulations, then the Yogalaya or Fitness Centre in the individual building shall not be permissible free of FSI
clause_text: In case of larger layout where there is existing/proposed Club House in layout RG under Regulation 27 ofthese regulations, then the Yogalaya or Fitness Centre in the individual building shall not be permissible free of FSI.
